info.label: Software Engineer - Ruby developer
info.brief:
I'm a French software engineer living in Amsterdam, Netherlands. I am 28, speak fluent English, and have a Master's degree in Computer Science from one of the top French Computer Engineering schools.

I am a ruby developer (Ruby on Rails, Grape API...) with strong software and cloud architecture skills. I am an Elixir enthusiast (functional programming), and keen to further my skills with front-end technologies like React or Relay.

My technology monitoring skills, up to date with the current state of our industry, will be appreciated. On a personal note, I have played baseball my whole life, including one year of college Baseball in California.

history.summary: Mila is a smart contact manager that integrates with the tools you use for your business.
Everydayhero is a crowdfunding platform aimed at charity fundraising.
Oomph is a platform for publishers and advertisers allowing them to create digital magazines or ads for mobile devices and tablets.

Visibleo is a web-marketing start-up based in the Paris Suburbs. They perform Facebook Ads and Google AdWords campaigns, while also creating websites for their clients. In charge of creating and developing web applications for the IT department of the company.

Reputation Squad is an E-Reputation agency in Paris: the company manages and monitors its clients’ reputation on the Internet. In charge of creating and developing web and social media monitoring tools for the agency
Consultant in projects for several large-scale French companies like Air France or Renault.
highlights: Managed a developer team based in India from France

projects.title: Adomatic
projects.summary: Solution to convert an existing print Ad inventory into engaging rich media Ads for tablet and mobile.

projects.title: Global Sourcing Renault
projects.summary: In charge of a vehicle selling application for RENAULT's employees (as a consultant with Sogeti). Technical  specifications, and management of an Off-Shore development team in India. Also testing, deployement actions, bug management.

projects.title: Air France Check-In
projects.summary: Development and maintenance of a test automaton for the new passenger check-in system for Air France and SkyTeam (KLM, Alitalia….). Discussions with the KLM dev team to help them develop their own automaton. The automaton was designed to take over every interface (Desk, Internet portal, self check-in).

projects.title: Paris Universite Club Baseball web app
projects.description: Creating a new web application for the Paris Baseball Club
projects.summary: Design, implementation, deployment of a web app for the Paris Baseball Softball and Cricket club. Providing blogs, emails and player management tools for the amateur club

history.title: Master's degree of computer science and software engineering
Bachelor's degree of computer science and software engineering

history.summary: This is the club I grew up with, playing, coaching the kids, and ultimately being the club captain of the first team of Paris' baseball club.
Playing competitive baseball for the best club in Brisbane, and teaching the game to the younger generation.
Teaching Brisbane's top baseball talent how to improve their game.

disposition.authorization: EU citizen, no extra paperwork required.
